titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Floyd Spence, a Representative from South Carolina.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 234.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/5/2001--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Representative Floyd Spence of South Carolina.
